channel.title: CVE Feed for Universal Robots -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Universal Robots -- all products

item.title: CVE-2018-10635|2024-08-05T07:46:46.326Z -- universal%20robots -- universal%20robots%20robot%20controllers%20version%20cb%203.1%2C%20sw%20version%203.4.5-100
item.description: In Universal Robots Robot Controllers Version CB 3.1, SW Version 3.4.5-100, ports 30001/TCP to 30003/TCP listen for arbitrary URScript code and execute the code. This enables a remote attacker who has access to the ports to remotely execute code that may allow root access to be obtained.

item.title: CVE-2018-10633|2024-08-05T07:46:46.438Z -- universal%20robots -- universal%20robots%20robot%20controller%20version%20cb%203.1%2C%20sw%20version%203.4.5-100
item.description: Universal Robots Robot Controllers Version CB 3.1, SW Version 3.4.5-100 utilizes hard-coded credentials that may allow an attacker to reset passwords for the controller.
